alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 9:29AM CDT until May 01 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. .Ongoing rises of the Goose River are anticipated. Moderate flooding impacts are expected, with crest getting near Major Flood Stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Sunday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
